title: A Portrait of Katherine Mansfield
creator_credit: Julienne Stretton, Sue Kedgely and Marigold Productions
brief_description: This is the story of the short and extraordinary life of New Zealand writer Katherine Mansfield. Katherine Mansfield was one of the great short stories writers of the English language. Her work is still studied in over twenty languages.
creator_credit_for_label: Julienne Stretton, Sue Kedgely and Marigold Productions
